entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 5:52 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: WNW 45 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
